class.name: QMeshCircleNode
class.description: QMeshCircleNode allows you to create circle-shaped meshes. Its core idea is to produce a QMeshNode with a single particle whose radius is set. [b]Note:[/b] These helper types of QMeshNode, once added to the scene, are converted into a typical QMeshNode with particles, spring connections, UV mappings, and a polygon. After being added to the scene, all modifications and adjustments should be done using the general methods of QMeshNode, rather than the member properties defined here.

members.member: The center position of the circle.
